privacyPage.section2Title: 2. Collection and Processing of Personal Data
privacyPage.section2Text: We collect personal data only if you voluntarily provide it to us via the contact form. The data collected usually includes:
privacyPage.section2Text6: These data are used exclusively for processing your inquiry. No transfer to third parties takes place.
